Articles.Content: So Harv is 15, and he has the ARM patch for showing. As far as I know, only members of the media group get it. I saw on the application that it was 18 years or older... Confused here

I don't know about that, but I (sorry that's the only thing I can add) have to make a tiny correction (though it probably won't help with your problems): Harv (I guess you mean HOC?) currently is 16 years old.
Yes, hoc gaming but he is still under 18 years
